radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse mucosal hyperemia of the colon with mild thickening of the colonic wall, most notable in the transverse colon. The appendix is abnormal, with mucosal hyperemia and mural thickening with mild adjacent fat stranding. Diameter measures up to 12 mm. Findings concerning for appendicitis versus ulcerative colitis flare involving the colon. Prominent/reactive mesenteric lymph nodes measuring up to 1.0 cm.
